    • Method Detail

      • withdraw

        public int withdraw(double amount)
        Withdraw the amount of money and check if an overdraft occurs. Check if the available balance goes below zero. If so, charge an overdraft fee.
        Overrides:
        withdraw in class Account
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be withdrawn
        Returns:
        0 if success

      • computeInterest

        public double computeInterest()
        Calculate the interest in this account. Non-interest checking accounts , thus always return 0.
        Returns:
        the interest

      • computeFees

        public double computeFees()
        Calculate the monthly maintenance fee plus overdraft fee. Checking accounts have no monthly fee , thus always return the total of overdraft fee.
        Returns:
        the total of overdraft fee
